about.title: About {{ProdFullName}} API
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) offers an advanced set of metadata management features, allowing developers to easily read, doc, delete, find, compare, replace and export metadata information from images and document formats without using any external software. Use metadata manipulation API to edit metadata details from PDF, Microsoft Office Word, Excel spreadsheets, PowerPoint presentations, Outlook emails, OneNote, Visio, Project, AutoCAD, Archive and Multimedia file formats along with the support for working with many other metadata processing features.

more_features.title: Manage {{FileFormatUp}} Inner Metadata Properties for {{EnvName}} Apps
more_features.description: The {{ProdShortName}} API lets developers easily edit document details (metadata) in various formats using their {{EnvName}} applications. Programmatically add, update, search for, and remove document properties.

feature_1.title: Effective Metadata Integration
feature_1.content: {{ProdShortName}} simplifies adding different properties to documents and files within your {{EnvName}} apps. Developers can easily apply, update, or remove document properties programmatically.

feature_2.title: Precise Metadata Control
feature_2.content: The API offers extensive options for managing document properties. Developers can efficiently find and process any hidden data placed in business files.

feature_3.title: Leveraging Built-in {{FileFormatUp}} Properties
feature_3.content: Depending on the document format, developers can utilize existing properties like EXIF data for images. This might include information like camera details, resolution, creation date, and more.
